EmptyBlock.description:
Description
Checks for empty blocks. This check does not validate sequential blocks.
Sequential blocks won't be checked. Also, no violations for fallthrough:


switch (a) {
case 1:                          // no violation
case 2:                          // no violation
case 3: someMethod(); { }        // no violation
default: break;
}


NOTE: This check processes LITERAL_CASE and LITERAL_DEFAULT separately.
Verification empty block is done for single nearest {@code case} or {@code default}.
EmptyBlock.option:
option, Specify the policy on block contents., BlockOption, statement
tokens, tokens to check, subset of tokens

LITERAL_WHILE
,
